column6:
This single family home is located in SE Houston, 1 mile from Hobby Airport.

Local Attractions:
NRG Stadium 10mi
Downtown 9.9mi
Houston Zoo 9.9mi
Museum District 9.9mi
Galleria 15mi

The living area is modern but cozy with high speed internet and a 55in SmartTV. The 4 bedrooms have queen beds and the 2 masters have restrooms. There's 1 hallway shower and 5 parking spots available. 

Decent sized backyard and patio. Pets are welcome.
